description: Help message for the plot command
default: Plot commands
/plot - show this message
/plot buy - buy a plot
/plot info - show info about the plot you're standing on
/plot kick <player> - kick a player from your plot
/plot list - list all plots you have access to
/plot sell - sells your plot to the server
/plot setowner <player> - sets the owner of your plot
/plot trust <player> - trust a player with your plot
/plot untrust <player> - untrust a player from your plot
/plot deny <player> - deny a player access to your plot
/plot undeny <player> - remove a player from your plot's deny list

description: Message when a player is not standing on a plot
default: You are not standing on a plot

description: Message when the plot is not owned by a player
default: This plot is not owned by a player

description: Message when a player is not the owner of a plot
default: You are not the owner of this plot

description: Message when a player tries to buy a plot that is already owned
default: This plot is already owned by {owner}

placeholders.description: The player who owns the plot

description: Message when a player tries to buy a plot but doesn't have enough money
default: You don't have enough money to buy this plot

placeholders.description: The price of the plot

description: Message that the player must confirm to buy a plot
default: Are you sure you want to buy this plot for {price}? Type /plot buy confirm to confirm

placeholders.description: The price of the plot

description: Message when a player tries to confirm a plot buy but hasn't requested to buy a plot
default: You haven't requested to buy a plot

description: Message when a player successfully buys a plot
default: You have successfully bought this plot for {price}

placeholders.description: The price of the plot

description: Message when a player tries to confirm an action but hasn't requested something that requires confirmation
default: You haven't requested to confirm

description: Message when a player tries to deny themselves from a plot
default: You can't deny yourself from your own plot

description: Message when a player tries to deny a player from a plot that they are already denied from
default: {player} is already denied from this plot

placeholders.description: The player who is denied from the plot

description: Message when a player successfully denies a player from a plot
default: You have denied {player} from this plot

placeholders.description: The player who is denied from the plot

description: Message to send to a player when they are denied from a plot
default: You have been denied from {owner}'s plot

placeholders.description: The owner of the plot

description: Message to show info about a plot
default: Plot info
Owner: {owner}
Price: {price}
Trusted: {trusted}
Denied: {denied}

placeholders.description: The owner of the plot
The price of the plot
The players who are trusted on the plot
The players who are denied from the plot

description: Message when a player tries to kick themselves from a plot
default: You can't kick yourself from your own plot

description: Message when a player tries to kick a player from a plot that they are not on
default: {player} is not on this plot

placeholders.description: The player who is not on the plot

description: Message when a player successfully kicks a player from a plot
default: You have kicked {player} from this plot

placeholders.description: The player who is kicked from the plot

description: Message to send to a player when they are kicked from a plot
default: You have been kicked from {owner}'s plot

placeholders.description: The owner of the plot

description: Header for the plot list
default: You have {owned.amount} plots

placeholders.description: The amount of plots the player owns
The amount of plots the player is trusted on
The amount of plots the player is denied from

description: Footer for the plot list
default: Plots

placeholders.description: The amount of plots the player owns
The amount of plots the player is trusted on
The amount of plots the player is denied from

description: Title for the owned plots section of the plot list
default: Owned plots ({amount}):

placeholders.description: The amount of plots the player owns

description: Message to show a plot that is owned b the player in the plot list

placeholders.description: The x coordinate of the plot
The y coordinate of the plot
The z coordinate of the plot

description: Title for the trusted plots section of the plot list
default: Trusted plots ({amount}):

placeholders.description: The amount of plots the player is trusted on

description: Message to show a plot in the plot list
default: - at {x}, {y}, {z} - {owner}
